title-group.article-title: Discretisation of an Infinite Delay Equation

abstract.p: In this paper, a Banach phase space containing BC(-∞, 0] and contained in C(-∞, 0] is defined with which existence of a solution and convergence of a discrete scheme are proved for an infinite delay differential equation.
